verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about לְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> for the dead לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יִטַּמָּ֖א <S%H2930><s%> unto them There shall none be defiled בְּעַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> among his people

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> for לִשְׁאֵר֔וֹ <S%H7607><s%> But for his kin הַקָּרֹ֖ב <S%H7138><s%> that is near אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him לְאִמּ֣וֹ <S%H517><s%> unto him [that is] for his mother וּלְאָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> and for his father וְלִבְנ֥וֹ <S%H1121><s%> and for his son וּלְבִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> and for his daughter וּלְאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> and for his brother

וְלַאֲחֹת֤וֹ <S%H269><s%> And for his sister הַבְּתוּלָה֙ <S%H1330><s%> a virgin הַקְּרוֹבָ֣ה <S%H7138><s%> that is nigh אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> has לְאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto him which hath had no husband לָ֖הּ יִטַּמָּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> for her may he be defiled

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִטַּמָּ֖א <S%H2930><s%> [But] he shall not defile בַּ֣עַל <S%H1167><s%> himself [being] a chief man בְּעַמָּ֑יו <S%H5971><s%> among his people לְהֵ֖חַלּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2490><s%> to profane

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor [יִקְרְחָה כ] (יִקְרְח֤וּ <S%H7139><s%> make bald ק) קָרְחָה֙ <S%H7144><s%> baldness בְּרֹאשָׁ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their head וּפְאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> the corner זְקָנָ֖ם <S%H2206><s%> of their beard לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְגַלֵּ֑חוּ <S%H1548><s%> neither shall they shave off וּבִ֨בְשָׂרָ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> in their flesh לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשְׂרְט֖וּ <S%H8295><s%> nor make שָׂרָֽטֶת׃ <S%H8296><s%> any cuttings

קְדֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H6918><s%> therefore they shall be holy יִהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> unto their God וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not יְחַלְּל֔וּ <S%H2490><s%> and not profane שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> the name אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> of their God כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשֵּׁ֨י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֶ֧חֶם <S%H3899><s%> [and] the bread אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> of their God הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they מַקְרִיבִ֖ם <S%H7126><s%> they do offer וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> They shall be holy

אִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> a wife זֹנָ֤ה <S%H2181><s%> [that is] a whore וַחֲלָלָה֙ <S%H2491><s%> or profane לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִקָּ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> They shall not take וְאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> a woman גְּרוּשָׁ֥ה <S%H1644><s%> put away מֵאִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H376><s%> from her husband לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִקָּ֑חוּ <S%H3947><s%> neither shall they take כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָדֹ֥שׁ <S%H6918><s%> for he [is] holy ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> unto his God

וְקִדַּשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H6942><s%> Thou shalt sanctify כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> of thy God ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מַקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> him therefore for he offereth קָדֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> he shall be holy יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּ֔ךְ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> you [am] holy אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee for I the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H6942><s%> which sanctify

וּבַת֙ <S%H1323><s%> And the daughter אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of any כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> priest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> if תֵחֵ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> if she profane לִזְנ֑וֹת <S%H2181><s%> herself by playing the whore אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> her father הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> she מְחַלֶּ֔לֶת <S%H2490><s%> she profaneth בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire תִּשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> she shall be burnt ס

וְהַכֹּהֵן֩ <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֨וֹל <S%H1419><s%> And [he that is] the high מֵאֶחָ֜יו <S%H251><s%> among his brethren אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose יוּצַ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> was poured עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רֹאשׁ֣וֹ ׀ <S%H7218><s%> upon whose head שֶׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָה֙ <S%H4888><s%> the anointing וּמִלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> able לִלְבֹּ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> to put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּגָדִ֑ים <S%H899><s%> on the garments אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁוֹ֙ <S%H7218><s%> his head לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִפְרָ֔ע <S%H6544><s%> shall not uncover וּבְגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִפְרֹֽם׃ <S%H6533><s%> nor rend

וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any נַפְשֹׁ֥ת <S%H5315><s%> body מֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> to any dead לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָבֹ֑א <S%H935><s%> Neither shall he go in לְאָבִ֥יו <S%H1><s%> himself for his father וּלְאִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> or for his mother לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִטַּמָּֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> nor defile

וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> of the sanctuary לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> Neither shall he go out וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְחַלֵּ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> nor profane אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִקְדַּ֣שׁ <S%H4720><s%> the sanctuary אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> of his God כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for נֵ֠זֶר <S%H5145><s%> for the crown שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil מִשְׁחַ֧ת <S%H4888><s%> of the anointing אֱלֹהָ֛יו <S%H430><s%> of his God עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> [is] upon him I [am] the LORD
וְה֕וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> a wife בִבְתוּלֶ֖יהָ <S%H1331><s%> in her virginity יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> And he shall take

אַלְמָנָ֤ה <S%H490><s%> A widow וּגְרוּשָׁה֙ <S%H1644><s%> or a divorced woman וַחֲלָלָ֣ה <S%H2491><s%> or profane זֹנָ֔ה <S%H2181><s%> [or] an harlot אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> may not יִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> these shall he not take כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בְּתוּלָ֥ה <S%H1330><s%> a virgin מֵעַמָּ֖יו <S%H5971><s%> of his own people יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> but he shall take אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> he will not יְחַלֵּ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> Neither shall he profane זַרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> his seed בְּעַמָּ֑יו <S%H5971><s%> among his people כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God מְקַדְּשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6942><s%> do sanctify פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Whosoever מִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֞ <S%H2233><s%> [he be] of thy seed לְדֹרֹתָ֗ם <S%H1755><s%> in their generations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has בוֹ֙ מ֔וּם <S%H3971><s%> that hath [any] blemish לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No יִקְרַ֔ב <S%H7126><s%> let him not approach לְהַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> to offer לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> of his God

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> For whatsoever man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בּ֥וֹ מ֖וּם <S%H3971><s%> [he be] that hath a blemish לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִקְרָ֑ב <S%H7126><s%> he shall not approach אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man עִוֵּר֙ <S%H5787><s%> a blind א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or פִסֵּ֔חַ <S%H6455><s%> or a lame א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or חָרֻ֖ם <S%H2763><s%> or he that hath a flat nose א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שָׂרֽוּעַ׃ <S%H8311><s%> or any thing superfluous

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Or a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has ב֖וֹ שֶׁ֣בֶר <S%H7667><s%> A broken רָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> foot א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שֶׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> broken יָֽד׃ <S%H3027><s%> hand

אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or גִבֵּ֣ן <S%H1384><s%> Or crookbackt אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or דַ֔ק <S%H1851><s%> or a dwarf א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or תְּבַלֻּ֣ל <S%H8400><s%> or that hath a blemish בְּעֵינ֑וֹ <S%H5869><s%> in his eye א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or גָרָב֙ <S%H1618><s%> or be scurvy א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or יַלֶּ֔פֶת <S%H3217><s%> or scabbed א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מְר֥וֹחַ <S%H4790><s%> broken אָֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H810><s%> or hath his stones

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> No man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בּ֣וֹ מ֗וּם <S%H3971><s%> that hath a blemish מִזֶּ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> of the seed אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִגַּ֔שׁ <S%H5066><s%> shall come nigh לְהַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> to offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מ֣וּם <S%H3971><s%> he hath a blemish בּ֔וֹ אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> of his God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִגַּ֖שׁ <S%H5066><s%> he shall not come nigh לְהַקְרִֽיב׃ <S%H7126><s%> to offer

לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> of his God מִקָּדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> [both] of the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> holy וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and of הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> and of the holy יֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> He shall eat

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> only אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַפָּרֹ֜כֶת <S%H6532><s%> unto the vail לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> Only he shall not go in וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <S%H4196><s%> unto the altar לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יִגַּ֖שׁ <S%H5066><s%> nor come nigh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מ֣וּם <S%H3971><s%> because he hath a blemish בּ֑וֹ וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יְחַלֵּל֙ <S%H2490><s%> that he profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְדָּשַׁ֔י <S%H4720><s%> not my sanctuaries כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for I the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <S%H6942><s%> do sanctify

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> told מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> [it] unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his sons וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> and unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ
